member.name: T:Ranorex.Plugin.Js
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Ranorex.Plugin.Js.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Ranorex.Plugin.Js.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:Ranorex.Plugin.IdClassifier
member.summary: The IdClassifier can extract learned patterns from a list of identifiers. The ids are grouped into patterns, then those patterns are classified based on their shared contents as dynamic or static. (See Pattern)

member.name: T:Ranorex.Plugin.Pattern
member.summary: Represents a pattern common to a set of ids e.g. textbox-1, textbox-2 etc. Pattern classification into dynamic/static follows a decision-tree trained with a large number of labeled id examples.

member.name: T:Ranorex.Plugin.LinearSvmIdClassifier
member.summary: Linear SVM based classifier for dynamic/static ids. This classifier does not require all ids, but works only with the id string.

member.name: P:Ranorex.Plugin.WebFlavor.EmbeddedWebDocumentsEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value specifying whether the automation of embedded IE web documents is enabled.
member.remarks: If this setting is set to true, the automation of Internet Explorer web documents embedded in other applications is enabled.

member.name: T:Ranorex.WebDocument
member.summary: The element represents a web document opened as a browser tab or embedded in another application.

member.name: P:Ranorex.WebDocument.MaxScreenshotWidth
member.summary: Maximum width of screen-shot captured. Default is 8192. Property is used in method.

member.name: P:Ranorex.WebDocument.MaxScreenshotHeight
member.summary: Maximum height of screen-shot captured. Default is 32768. Property is used in method.

member.name: M:Ranorex.WebDocument.CaptureFullPageScreenshot(Ranorex.WebDocument.CapturePageFlags)
member.summary: Captures a full page screen shot of the WebDocument.
member.param: Flags controlling the behavior of the capture operation.
member.remarks: Uses default values for redrawRetries (5), compareThreshold( .999) and compareDelay (500). The CSS modification flags are currently experimental.
member.returns: A bitmap with the full page screen-shot.

member.name: M:Ranorex.WebDocument.CaptureFullPageScreenshot(System.Int32,System.Double,System.Int32,Ranorex.WebDocument.CapturePageFlags,System.Action{Ranorex.WebDocument,System.Int32,System.Int32})
member.summary: Captures a full page screen-shot of the WebDocument.
member.remarks: The CSS modification flags are currently experimental.
member.param: The compare threshold for scroll/redraw detection.
The internal compare delay for scroll/redraw detection.
Flags controlling the behavior of the capture operation.
An optional callback which is called before the page is scrolled while capturing.
member.returns: A bitmap with the full page screen-shot.

member.name: T:Ranorex.WebDocument.CapturePageFlags
member.summary: Flags controlling the detailed behavior of the screen-shot capture operation.

member.name: F:Ranorex.WebDocument.CapturePageFlags.None
member.summary: Website is captured "as is" by scrolling only.

member.name: F:Ranorex.WebDocument.CapturePageFlags.DisableCssTransitions
member.summary: Temporarily disables all CSS transitions and animations before capturing screen-shot tiles.

member.name: F:Ranorex.WebDocument.CapturePageFlags.HidePositionFixed
member.summary: Temporarily hides all CSS "position: fixed" elements before capturing screen-shot tiles, with the exception of the left upper tile at scroll position (0,0)

member.name: M:Ranorex.WebDocument.WaitForDocumentLoaded
member.summary: Waits until the document is loaded.
member.remarks: Calling this method is equivalent to calling with the timeout parameter set to .

member.name: M:Ranorex.WebDocument.WaitForDocumentLoaded(Ranorex.Duration)
member.summary: Waits until the document is loaded or the timeout has expired.
member.param: Specifies the maximum time to wait for the document to be loaded.
member.exception: If the timeout is negative.
If the specified expired before the document is loaded.

member.name: M:Ranorex.WebDocument.Navigate(System.String,System.Boolean,Ranorex.Duration)
member.summary: Instructs the web browser associated with this web document to navigate to the specified .
member.param: Specifies whether this method should block until the new document has been loaded.
Specifies the maximum time to wait for the document to be loaded.
member.exception: If the timeout is negative.
If the specified elapsed before the document is loaded.
member.remarks: The may be absolute (http://www.host.com/path/to/webpage) or relative (path/to/webpage) to the current URL of the web document.

member.name: M:Ranorex.WebDocument.Navigate(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Instructs the web browser associated with this web document to navigate to the specified .
member.param: Specifies whether this method should block until the new document has been loaded.
member.remarks:
An infinite timeout is used when waiting for the document to be loaded.
The may be absolute (http://www.host.com/path/to/webpage) or relative (path/to/webpage) to the current URL of the web document.

member.name: M:Ranorex.WebDocument.Navigate(System.String)
member.summary: Instructs the web browser associated with this web document to navigate to the specified .
member.remarks:
An infinite timeout is used to wait for the document to be loaded.
The may be absolute (http://www.host.com/path/to/webpage) or relative (path/to/webpage) to the current URL of the web document.
